abstract: Rafik Halliche (Arabic: رفيق حليش‎; born 2 September 1986) is an Algerian professional footballer who plays for Académica de Coimbra in Portugal, as a central defender.An Algerian international, Halliche has represented the nation at the 2010 Africa Cup of Nations and the 2010 World Cup.
comment: Rafik Halliche (Arabic: رفيق حليش‎; born 2 September 1986) is an Algerian professional footballer who plays for Académica de Coimbra in Portugal, as a central defender.An Algerian international, Halliche has represented the nation at the 2010 Africa Cup of Nations and the 2010 World Cup.
name: Halliche, Rafik
